name: Doors & Rooms: Basement
description:
Trapped in a filthy basement... Doesn't seem like a place to spend your day. Use your escaping skill to find your way out and don't forget to close the door after you!
So are you ready for this mini-adventure filled with puzzles, combining items and smartphone's magic? The clock is ticking, don't waste your time and escape!
Features
Challenging logic puzzles
Beautiful graphics
Easy to start – hard to put down
Smartphone's magic

How to play
Find and use items
Solve mini-puzzles
Use your device (tilting and shaking)
